about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a full stack developer with experience in building web applications using modern technologies. On the front-end, I typically work with TypeScript and React.js. I have solid knowledge of the Next.js framework, which allows me to efficiently manage both front-end and back-end. For applications that require more complex back-end functionality, I use Node.js. Additionally, I have experience with relational databases, including PostgreSQL and MySQL. I have strong expertise in consuming RESTful and GraphQL APIs, integrating data from various sources to build robust and scalable web applications.

project1.title: Memo Game
project1.description: Memory game developed in Next.js, React.js, and TypeScript. The game features a scoring system that is stored in a database and generates a ranking of the top 10 players. The front-end and back-end are managed together by Next.js.
project1.label: Play

project2.title: BMI Calculator
project2.description: Web application where, by entering your weight and height, the calculator informs you of your Body Mass Index. Project made with React.js and TypeScript.
project2.label: Access

project3.title: Pop-it Digital Game
project3.description: Mobile pop-it game developed in Next.js, React.js, and TypeScript. The game involves pressing the buttons that become active within a time limit, with phases that advance and become more challenging with each level.
project3.label: Access

project4.title: Premia Kids
project4.description: Project under development. It will be a web application. The front-end is being built with Next.js, React.js, and TypeScript. The back-end is completed with Node.js and the database is in PostgreSQL. The application will be an incentive for children's daily tasks, with scoring, rewards, and more.
project4.label: Coming soon

project5.title: Digital Drum
project5.description: Pop-it game for mobile developed in Next.js, React.js, and TypeScript. The game consists of pressing the buttons that become active, with a time limit and phases that advance and become more challenging with each level. Mobile application, access it on your phone to play.
project5.label: Access

project6.title: Forms
project6.description: Examples of forms developed for web applications using React.js and TypeScript. These are forms with field validation and data submission to the back-end using Axios.
project6.label: View

project7.title: Web Pages
project7.description: Examples of web pages developed using React.js and Tailwind.
project7.label: View
